articles.content: It has indeed become difficult for filmmakers to impress audiences with crime movies/series, given that a significant portion of the content being consumed nowadays falls under this (broad) genre. Pa… [+5793 chars]

articles.description: Aaradhya Bachchan was recently trolled for her first-ever public speech at an event on her mother Aishwarya Rai Bachchan’s birthday. The star kid praised her mommy for celebrating her birthday by attending an event for the welfare of cancer patients and makin…
